body:
After issuing the command  `spack env activate <env> -p`, the terminal will be messed up when trying to scroll up to long command and edit it.

In bash, the none printable character should be wrapped by `\[...\]` (ref: https://unix.stackexchange.com/a/28828/458503)

https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/c1b51d6e997667120f31b27efbf9d5c99e540566/lib/spack/spack/environment/shell.py#L42
title: Wrap none printable character in PS1 by `\[...\]`
